definitions.text: a collection of things wrapped or boxed together
a package of several things tied together for carrying or storing
a large sum of money (especially as pay or profit)
examples: she made a bundle selling real estate
they sank megabucks into their new house
he bundled up his few possessions

definitions.text: gather or cause to gather into a cluster
examples: She bunched her fingers into a fist

definitions.text: sleep fully clothed in the same bed with one's betrothed
